content: {"Name": "CHOW - St. Paul's Episcopal Church Pantry", "Entity_Id": 3726, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "All Other - NYS Food Pantries", "Organization": "CHOW- St. Paul's Episcopal Church Pantry", "More_Information": "Call the CHOW\u00ae Hotline at (607) 723-8960, or First Call for Help at 211 for a food pantry referral.", "Counties": ["Broome"], "Location": "", "Address": "200 Jefferson Ave", "City": "Endicott", "State": "NY", "Zip": "13760", "Phone": "(607) 748-8118", "Hours_of_Operation": "Third and Fourth Monday 11:00 am \u2013 1:00 pm\\n Third and Fourth Wednesday 11:00 am \u2013 1:00 pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://stpaulsendicott.org/community-outreach/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.100283", "Longitude": "-76.0509077", "Last_Updated": "01-15-2024", "icon": "marker-C53E2A", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
